featured.text: More than 2,000 adults took part in the survey to find out about their knowledge of diet, healthcare, disease control, and medication.

other.text: Dooley keeps Peanuts company while the adults in the family attend to Grandfather.

definition.zh_def: 成年人；已達到法定年齡的人。
definition.en_def: A person who is fully grown or developed, typically over the age of 18.
definition.example: She became an adult when she turned 18.
